explanation: Despite a highly mixed sentiment, the majority of engaged traders and commentators expect upward movement, with strong support and aggressive bounce-buying behavior visible in opinions. Many mention trendline bounces, positive technical patterns (cup and handle, engulfing), and anticipation of new highs (109k, 300k, 600k). While some users are shorting or warning of dumps, these are countered by equally strong or stronger bullish voices and actual buying/re-entry actions. Notably, traders are entering with leverage and discussing holding through volatility. The presence of institutional buying news (GameStop allocating reserves to BTC) and technical analysis support a buy bias. However, large price swings and frequent stop-loss hits are noted, so leverage should be used carefully.
